title: Eric Hobsbawm: history and politics
itunes:title: Eric Hobsbawm: history and politics
itunes:subtitle: Professor Richard J Evans discusses his new biography of Eric Hobsbawm, the influential 20th-century historian who was famously – and sometimes controversially – a committed Marxist throughout his career
description:
Professor Richard J Evans discusses his new biography of Eric Hobsbawm, the influential 20th-century historian who was famously – and sometimes controversially – a committed Marxist throughout his career

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
